thread.title: UK basketball's Big Blue Madness to be televised
thread.title_full: UK basketball's Big Blue Madness to be televised

author: courier-journal.com
title: UK basketball's Big Blue Madness to be televised
text:
The SEC Network will air UK basketball's Big Blue Madness event Oct. 16 at Rupp Arena, per an announcement Thursday, making the first time it will be televised live and in its entirety on a national platform.
ESPN analyst Dave O'Brien will call the event with Sean Farnham and Kara Lawson. The event begins at 7 p.m.
